answers.answer: I would go to another doctor if I were you. I don't think I could be patient enough.
is that even healthy? aren't you supposed to be seen once a month?
& they need to take blood & stuff before that! that's not healthy.Say if you had a Urinary tract infection & you don't get the pills it can harm the baby. & that's very common in pregnancy
Find another doctor that can take you sooner. Maybe your friends, neighbor, co worker friend of a friend can recommend you a doctor. If you use Facebook ask friends if they can refer to obgyn
This doctor was recommend by many of my friends. unfortunately
I called my doctor and im not gonna be seen until Dec. 1 and ill be 15 weeks pregnant.
have you been seen at all? at least?
Gonna find a new doctor. Im scared something will happen when i was pregnant with my daughter i developed gestational diabetes and i want them to catch it early if i develop them again with this baby
why do they think that's okay? I thought you're supposed to be seen every month?
With my 1st pregnancy I went to the doc at 18wks and I was  just fine but it was due to me not haveing insurance

I have the same fear. We went to a pregnancy testing center yesterday where they did an ultrasound and told me a due date and everything and we saw the baby's heart beat but now I have to wait on medicaid before I go to an actual doctor and that tends to take forever.

question: I went to a women & teen center to get medicaid, which they also set you up w. a doctor. When I went they told me I was 7 weeks and this was last week. The teen center called me today telling me my doctor wasn't going to see me until December 3rd. Do I have a right to be upset & switch doctors? My boyfriend is making me feel like I'm overreacting & I'll be fine from now until then. But I'm just not at ease with winging it for the first 3 months w. out a doctor.
title: 7-8 weeks & still no doctor.
